DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , control , examiner-blind , parallel group , four week clinical study compare brush plus floss brush alone 60 healthy adult pre-existing gingivitis .
DOC.brief_title: A Controlled Clinical Study Determine Gingivitis Benefit Flossing
DOC.criteria: In order include study , subject must : least 18 year age ; physically able floss teeth ; minimum 18 natural teeth ( teeth grossly carious , fully crown , extensively restore include ) ; refrain perform oral hygiene morning Baseline visit ; good general health ; interproximal MGI ( Modified Gingival Index ) score > 2.8 . Subjects exclude study participation evidence : severe periodontal disease ; discoloration pigmentation gingival tissue ; meaningful misalignment front teeth ; fix facial orthodontic appliance ; use antibiotic within two week Baseline Visit time study ; disease condition could expect interfere subject safely complete study .
